page.title: 05SWAINSWICK PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: Our School is a country school. It has only 86 children. Only 2 of the children come from families in the village. All the rest come from some distance away and travel to school either by car or mini bus. There are three classrooms, the original one is made out of stone with a tiled roof, the other two are mobile classrooms made from wood. The age range is 4 to ll. I am in class 3 which is the top class and will be leaving very soon to go to Secondary school in Bath. In School we have a Headmistress, two full time teachers, two part time teachers, all female. All but two children stay at school for dinner, some bring a packed lunch.Hot meals are cooked in a central kitchen and sent to school they cost 64p.
